translations.Use Nextcloud as an SCIM identity provid: Use Nextcloud as an SCIM identity provider
translations.Use Nextcloud as an identity provider fo:
Use Nextcloud as an identity provider for external services using the [SCIM](https://scim.cloud/) standard.

Simply add your SCIM servers in the admin settings, and the app will automatically sync all Nextcloud users and groups to your servers.

⚠ This app is still under development.
Use Nextcloud as an identity provider for external services using the SCIM standard.
